accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: The identifier for the account the payment will be applied to.

broker.title: Broker
broker.description:
An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
                 Supersedes 
                
    
    
    bookingAgent.

category.title: Category
category.description: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

confirmationNumber.title: Confirmation Number
confirmationNumber.description: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.

minimumPaymentDue.title: Minimum Payment Due
minimumPaymentDue.description: The minimum payment required at this time.

paymentDueDate.title: Payment Due Date
paymentDueDate.description:
The date that payment is due.
                 Supersedes 
                
    
    
    paymentDue.

paymentMethodId.title: Payment Method Id
paymentMethodId.description: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).

paymentStatus.title: Payment Status
paymentStatus.description: The status of payment; whether the invoice has been paid or not.

provider.title: Provider
provider.description:
The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
                 Supersedes 
                
    
    
    carrier.

scheduledPaymentDate.title: Scheduled Payment Date
scheduledPaymentDate.description: The date the invoice is scheduled to be paid.
